name: Mystery of Mortlake Mansion
description: Mystery of Mortlake Mansion is a mystery adventure game with a dark alchemical and magical atmosphere, most of which feature Victorian-style oil painted graphics. The player under the impression of mortal peril, arrives to Mortlake Mansion to discover the mystery behind the strange letter and its sender, signed only as R. The mansion is filled with eerie rooms where the player must find a way to enter them by solving various puzzles and riddles. As the story develops, the player will meet a talking raven, a restless spirit, and an mysterious dark magician. Each puzzle the player solves takes the player closer to solving the mystery of Mortlake Mansion and its relation to the player.
